name: Foghat
description: '''Foghat''' are an English [[Rock music|rock]] band formed in [[London]] in 1971. The band are known for the use of electric [[slide guitar]] in their music. Their best known song is the 1975 hit "[[Slow Ride]]". The band have released 17 studio albums, including eight [[Music recording sales certification|gold album]]s and one platinum, along with one double platinum live album. Despite several line-up changes, the band continue to record and perform.
